::Lord Elder::

Elder: I'd be happy to be 'referee' here if the working relationship benefits all. This may be an uneasy working relationship but it's a start.

khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:                               As Jotunn was speaking, a medical team past by seeking for damaged
 bot. As they spotted Remus body, they rapidly gather his body and
 pluging him to an auxiliary energon source to keep him alive. They
 soon put him on a stretcher and disapeared as they came.
 
 Razorwing didn't pay attention to them. He knew that Jotunn was rigth
 : even with all the support he could get those airtanker freak could
 destroy this city bythemslef. And yet he couldn't get his hands on the
 leader of this mess. But Razorwing had another card in his hand. Has
 he put down is weapon, he controled his rage as he spoked
 
 Razorwing : Is all this destruction, death and disorder only have one
 goal? To open discution to concluded a pact? Realy? You know Jotunn
 you're not the diplomatic type. (the smell of sarcasm was all over the
 place) But course you're rigth to desire the extinction of the minions
 and I would be pleased to work with you to achieve this goal.
 (Razorwing was a serious and almost threatening) But keep in mind, and
 Lord Elder you are a witness, that a coup d'ï¿½tat as been try from
 yourself Jotunn and for that I cannot let you act as you please. THis
 is why the only treaty that will come out of our mutual interest will
 necessit a major compensasion. So if you want a pact I want Lord Elder
 to be referee and I requiered at least the occupation of the olympus
 complex by my forces, while you get the oportunity to work with our
 governement to get your ressources that you lack and economic benefic
 in certain field. These are my terms!
